page.title: 06COMMUNITY POLICEMAN, HULL
page.content: Police Constable Scruton is the{ {Community Police Officer}for most of East Hull. He has the largest patch in the City. He is responsible for the policing in most of our block. He is a local man, his father being deputy headmaster of one of the local schools. Because he is well known in the area he is often approached by people offering information about "jobs" who are unwilling to talk to other police officers. Much of his time is spent talking to and dealing with young people. For example, he has organanised several of the visits undertaken during the course of this project. He hopes that by getting to know the citizens when they are young, perhaps under his watchful eye he can keep them out of trouble. He is well liked in the area.
